name: Oh Sheep! (Jam & Swoon)
description:
August Mini Jam Submission

You are fedora-donning Sheep Hitmen. Kill everyone. Don't let Psycho Zombie Elmo get you. Don't chicken out.

Supports up to 3 players, one can play with the keyboard but the others need gamepads.  A to jump, B to shoot. Space and Cursors plus WASD. Esc restarts game.

This game was made (mostly) from scratch at the jam.

  • Code by Mahad, Lara, & Moritz
  • Art by Victor 
  • Music by Gabriel
